taxon.author: Logunov & Marusik, 1994
taxon.distribution: Russia (Europe to Far North-East), Kazakhstan, Central Asia, Mongolia, China

referenceObject.reference: Logunov, D. V. & Marusik, Y. M. (1994a). New data on the jumping spiders of the Palearctic fauna (Aranei Salticidae). Arthropoda Selecta 3(1-2): 101-115.
